name: Orgasm Simulator 3 💦
description:
Welcome to the world of Orgasm Simulator 3 💦 – an engaging real-time visual novel where romance and detective work intertwine in a three-dimensional virtual space.

You are a detective and the owner of an agency, and your house serves both as an office and a home. Explore every corner of it, unravel mysteries, and interact with objects that reveal new aspects of your work and personal life.
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/GIF_1.gif
Meet two girls working alongside you. Your decisions will influence the development of romantic relationships with each of them. And, of course, don't forget about detective cases – clients come with various problems that you must solve.

The game is an exciting blend of an entertainment simulator, where your decisions shape a group of personal scenarios. Culminating this story is adult content that adds intimacy and realism to your relationships.

Orgasm Simulator 3 💦 is your chance to immerse yourself in a world of emotions, solve mysteries, and enjoy unpredictable developments. Gather clients, uncover mysteries, and decide your own fates in this unique hybrid of a visual novel and detective simulator!

Features of "Orgasm Simulator 3"💦:
  • VN Style story with dynamic camera angles, and outfits you select
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • Diverse characters, each with unique personality traits and backgrounds, making your journey even more intriguing.
  • Explicit content and mature themes, suitable only for players 18 years and older
  • Ability to play with one hand 🤩
